issue.title: adultswim.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.7.156

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.adultswim.com%2Fstreams%2Frick-and-morty

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

||narvar.com/*/track|
||warnermedia.com/api/*/events?
||turner.com/csm/analytics;

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: amazon.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://amazon.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Famazon.com) ### Comment > images randomly wont load in amazon.com Username: `@cmoralesq` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/as5yfhhrj6wok40ksoo4048o8gccoc03axomk7rq7s.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/4jmev92wxcmcwsc040888oo8wws0cokqkmx2c127j4.png?nc=1)

Screenshot 2 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/kh0trhbwgy8cw08w4ckokk8gcsc80ssezu26hon8mo.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Mac v2.15.2.1734 release Browser: | Safari License type: | paid Tracking protection: | disabled DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | enabled Userscripts: | disabled Userstyles: | disabled Other extensions used: | none ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?channel=release&clid=wmnEcT--23kKnU--mZu8Ux--PIXrXZ&product_type=Mac&product_version=2.15.2.1734+release&utm_campaign=report&utm_medium=send-message&utm_source=mac&url=http%3A%2F%2Famazon.com)

comment.body: ive seen people post about this multiple times. i cant reproduce this issue though. just saying.
